The potential drivers of this include the absence of proven therapies, 3 ease of transmissibility, 4 rapidity of global spread, and high hospitalisation and mortality rate 5 coupled with greater pandemic preparedness and ease of greater global collaboration. It is concerning that only a minority of trials adhered to established markers of internal validity, such as blinding, allocation concealment, placebo where applicable, and a data safety monitoring committee presence.
